Trade/Device Name(s): N Antisera to Human Immunoglobulins (IgG, IgA, and IgM)
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for N Antisera to Human Immunoglobulins (IgG, IgA, and IgM) and N/T Protein Control LC for quantitative determination and quality control of immunoglobulins and proteins in human serum, plasma, urine, and CSF by immunonephelometry using BN™ Systems.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic reagents for quantitative determination of immunoglobulins (IgG, IgA, IgM) in human serum, plasma, urine, and CSF; N/T Protein Control LC intended as assayed quality control for assessment of precision and analytical bias in immunochemical determination of IgG, IgA, IgM, transferrin, albumin, a1-microglobulin, and total protein in urine and CSF using BN™ Systems.
